.@CARE I was so honored to speak at #CNC16. CARE truly embodies Americaâ€™s values & Americaâ€™s spirit - your work is absolutely vital.
The so-called #TrumpDoctrine is simply bellicose rhetoric strung together with contradictory statements. Bluster is no strategy, Mr. Trump.
Trumpâ€™s proposals to ban Muslims and deport immigrants would undermine Americaâ€™s greatest strengths: diversity and tolerance.
Trump's newest slogan is "America First," recalling the self-defeating isolationism of the 1930s.
Trumpâ€™s views on torture are completely out of sync with recommendations by military leaders and Americaâ€™s values.
Trump praises Western values, then questions why we should support democracy in other countries.
Trumpâ€™s understanding of trade policy is simplistic at best, and would have disastrous effects on our economy.
Trump preaches unpredictability as a policy, then asks us to trust him with the nuclear codes.
Trump speaks about regaining the trust of our allies, but then threatens to pull out of NATO.
Trump demonstrates no real understanding of complex international issues and has no serious proposals for how to address them.
So I thought I'd respond using his favorite method of communication and tackle some of the #TrumpDoctrine's biggest flaws head on.
Today, @realDonaldTrump tried out a foreign policy speech - something I have experience with.
